blogs.title: India defies Einstein's Laws of Gravity
blogs.excerpt: In the 2000s, blogs were often the work of a single individual, occasionally of a small group, and often covered a single subject.
blogs.author: Mr. Robert Downey Einstein

blogs.title: The Ultraviolet Catastrophe Explained
blogs.excerpt: How a simple problem with blackbody radiation led Max Planck to discover Quantum Mechanics.

blogs.title: Why Time Slows Down Near Black Holes
blogs.excerpt: Understanding gravitational time dilation without the complex math. Interstellar was right.

blogs.title: Schrödinger's Cat: Dead or Alive?
blogs.excerpt: The famous thought experiment that highlights the absurdity of quantum superposition.
blogs.author: Erwin Schrödinger

blogs.title: Thermodynamics in a Cup of Coffee
blogs.excerpt: Entropy, enthalpy, and why your latte eventually gets cold no matter what you do.
blogs.content: Heat death of the universe starts in your cup...
blogs.author: Ludwig Boltzmann

blogs.title: The Double Slit Experiment
blogs.excerpt: Light is a particle. No, it's a wave. Wait, it's both? The experiment that broke physics.
blogs.author: Richard Feynman

blogs.title: Maxwell's Equations for Dummies
blogs.excerpt: Four equations that describe everything about electricity and magnetism.

blogs.title: Newton vs. Leibniz: The Calculus War
blogs.excerpt: The bitter rivalry over who actually invented the math that makes physics possible.
blogs.author: Isaac Newton

blogs.title: Dark Matter: The Invisible Glue
blogs.excerpt: Galaxies spin too fast. Something invisible is holding them together.
blogs.author: Vera Rubin

blogs.title: The Standard Model of Particle Physics
blogs.excerpt: Quarks, Leptons, and Bosons. The building blocks of reality (mostly).
blogs.author: Peter Higgs

blogs.title: Why Can't We Travel Faster Than Light?
blogs.excerpt: Special Relativity puts a speed limit on the universe. Here is why you can't break it.

blogs.title: Fluid Dynamics: The Chaos of Water
blogs.excerpt: Why predicting the weather is hard and the Navier-Stokes equations are unsolved.

blogs.title: The Photoelectric Effect
blogs.excerpt: The discovery that won Einstein his Nobel Prize (Hint: It wasn't relativity).

blogs.title: String Theory: The Theory of Everything?
blogs.excerpt: Is the universe made of tiny vibrating strings in 11 dimensions?
blogs.author: Brian Greene

blogs.title: Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle
blogs.excerpt: You can know where a particle is, or how fast it's going. Not both.
blogs.author: Werner Heisenberg

blogs.title: The Physics of F1 Racing
blogs.excerpt: Downforce, drag coefficients, and the friction circle. Physics at 200mph.
